text:
A Disaster Control Management Plan was conducted at the Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) Bottling Plant of Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL) at Peelamedu here on Thursday. A scenario of gas leak was created and employees of the plant activated the emergency response system.

The objective of the drill was to keep major hazardous industries prepared to meet any emergencies arising out of eventualities such as LPG leak and fire.
title: Drill by BPCL
